description: This file defines a Spring Boot REST controller named NoteController that exposes CRUD endpoints for managing notes. It provides methods to list all notes, get a note by id, create a new note, update an existing note, and delete a note. The controller leverages annotations for request mapping, API documentation (Swagger/OpenAPI), and validation.

classes.name: NoteController
classes.description: REST controller exposing CRUD endpoints for notes, handling HTTP requests and responses related to note entities.

methods.name: listNotes
methods.description: Returns a list of all notes.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a single note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note with provided details.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note specified by id.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note identified by id.
